title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Design and Analysis of Algorithms Addition of numbers, matrix multiplication, evaluation of arithmetic expressions, sorting, 0-1 knapsack problem, minimum spanning tree, traversal of trees, searching in a graph, analysis of time complexity and number of processors used, lower bound theory of parallel computation. Parallelism in computers - SIMD and MIMD models.
